events.message: I have been involved in a car collision yesterday afternoon and need to file an accident claim immediately.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle in the reported incident.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the case and will contact you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and are committed to processing it as quickly as possible.
Please submit all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driver’s license.
All requested documents such as the police report and vehicle photos have been submitted promptly for review.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has started to determine the details and verify the circumstances.
Investigation is complete, confirming the details of the collision and assessing the extent of damages to the vehicle.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment report and policy coverage limits.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
The auto accident claim has been formally approved and is moving forward to the payment stage.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customer’s bank account as per the policy terms.
The auto accident claim is now officially closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
